DataElement.preferredName: Eligibility Determination Checklist Complete And Uploaded To Clinical Trial Patient Database Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no response used to indicate whether the list of criteria used to determine eligibility of patients for a clinical trial has been completed and a file of this information has been transferred to a central database used in a research study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Eligibility Determination Checklist Complete And Upload To Clinical Trial Patient Database
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services._A list of items required or things to be done or considered._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion_An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._To transfer a file or program to a central computer from a smaller computer or a computer at a remote location._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care._A person who requires medical care._A database is an information set with a regular structure. Although it can be applied to any set of information the term was invented to refer to computerised data, and is used almost exclusively in computing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

Property.preferredName: Checklist Complete And Upload To Clinical Trial Patient Database
Property.preferredDefinition: A list of items required or things to be done or considered.:To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:To transfer a file or program to a central computer from a smaller computer or a computer at a remote location.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:An information set with a regular structure.  Although it can be applied to any set of information the term was invented to refer to computerized data, and is used almost exclusively in computing.

Concepts.definition: A list of items required or things to be done or considered.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
To transfer a file or program to a central computer from a smaller computer or a computer at a remote location.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
An information set with a regular structure.  Although it can be applied to any set of information the term was invented to refer to computerized data, and is used almost exclusively in computing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
